page.title: 19Why Do People Live In Dinas
page.content: {LIKES We went round Dinas with questionnaires and asked various people questions about Dinas.We have made a list of things which the people like about the village.The most popular things are that it is peaceful,close to the sea and the friendly people that live here. { {DISLIKES When we went round Dinas with the questionnaires we also asked them the things they dislike about the village.The most things that the people living are especially unhappy about are the heavy traffic on the main Cardigan to Fishguard road;the fact that there are no pavements in parts of the village;and the lack of facilities for young people.
